sidn.title: Sidn technical test
sidn.description: It consists of making a Wordpress theme with CSS and pure Javascript, in which I would make a request to the Wordpress API to get the paginated posts and create a load more button, to show more without reloading the page.

astronomia.title: Astronomy website
astronomia.description: It's a basic website made with HTML5, CSS3 and Javascript to add features like the burger menu, this was my last DAW project, it's a full responsive website for all devices. The information shown on the website is real data taken from the internet in 2024.

fotografo.title: Photographer Website
fotografo.description: It's a basic website made with HTML5, CSS3 and Javascript to add features like the burger menu, this was my second to last DAW project, it's a fully responsive website for all devices. It's about the portfolio of a photographer from Granada.
